Uses of Interface
grid.Tile

  • Packages that use Tile 
    Package Description
    grid  
    grid._2D

    • Uses of Tile in grid

      Classes in grid with type parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cursor<T extends Tile>
      An abstract cursor implementation that is able to select things in any grid
      class  Grid<T extends Tile>
      A collection for arbitrarily deep nested arrays Allows for the creation of variable-depth (determined at runtime) matrices.
      Methods in grid with type parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T extends Tile>
      Grid<T>      		 Grid.merge(Grid<? extends T> grid1, Grid<? extends T> grid2, java.util.function.BinaryOperator<T> combinor)
      Returns a new grid that is the merged version of the two input grids (which must be of the same dimension)
      Methods in grid with parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T Grid.getFrom(Tile base, java.lang.Integer... delta)
      Returns the tile located at the given delta (as a vector) from the base tile
